Summary: I am a retired employee of the (F.A.A.), & have much knowledge of usual aircraft's altitude & speed. Of all my year's of looking up at the skies, this is the very first time I,ve ever seen anything like this.
trends: There have been 39 other sightings in Sarasota
There were no other sightings in Sarasota on or around October 22nd 2011
divs: sighting detailsat 7:30pm est. i was standind outside in front of my door looking at the evening sky & star's when i witnessed an "object" cross the sky at an extremely high rate of speed from the north west---heading to the south east. before it went out of site it made a 180 degree u-turn & came back at me for about 3 to 4 sec's then disappeared\evaporated! i am a former (f.a.a.) employee, & this is the very first "object" i have ever seen after all the years i have been looking at the skies. the altitude was approximated at between 30,000 & 50,000 ft. it was hard to tell at the speed it was traveling at. (my front door face's due east.) mike.
